analysis.description:
Object.withdrawnTokens (/unique_contracts/0x8f5175be10fb6a709eb3ebaaf19e794a8c3f2ae5.sol#177-192) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20Interface(token).transfer(_to,balance) (/unique_contracts/0x8f5175be10fb6a709eb3ebaaf19e794a8c3f2ae5.sol#189-191)

CAVPlatform.massTransfer has external calls inside a loop:
	- CAVPlatformEmitter(eventsHistory).emitTransfer(msg.sender,addresses[idx],_symbol,value,) (/unique_contracts/0x8f5175be10fb6a709eb3ebaaf19e794a8c3f2ae5.sol#880-882)
ERC20Interface.symbol should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x8f5175be10fb6a709eb3ebaaf19e794a8c3f2ae5.sol#57-58)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_contracts/0x8f5175be10fb6a709eb3ebaaf19e794a8c3f2ae5.sol#109-110:
	- Usage of "suicide()" should be replaced with "selfdestruct()"

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_contracts/0x8f5175be10fb6a709eb3ebaaf19e794a8c3f2ae5.sol#864-882:
	- Usage of "msg.gas" should be replaced with "gasleft()"
CAVPlatformEmitter.emitTransfer (/unique_contracts/0x8f5175be10fb6a709eb3ebaaf19e794a8c3f2ae5.sol#21-25) should be declared external
